_header: Jesu that sprung of Jesse root
Subjects: hymns, to Christ; Christ, hymns to
_description: ‘Be my Coumfort Crist Ihesus’ — seven 12-line stanzas with this refrain

Lam853.First Lines:
Ihesus þat sprong of iesse rooteAs us haþ prechid þi
                    propheteFlour and fruyt boþe softe and soteTo mannis soule of
                    sauour swette…
Lam853.Last Lines:
…And to deie weel whanne it is my dayIhesu þat deied on
                    tre for usLete me not be þe feendis prayBut be my counfort crist
                    ihesus. AMEN
Lam853.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Hymns to the Virgin and Christ…and other religious poems.
EETS
         o.s. 24 (1867); repr. 1973: 12-14.
